name: The Purge
storyline: At the request of his wife, Cristina, Colsen plans a mountain climb, which is their favorite hobby. But things don't go the way they want them to. Colsen, who embarks on an adventure to search for his missing wife, has no idea what is to come. Join Colsen in this dark story, find the pieces hidden in the dimensions behind the doors and solve the mystery behind the story. Of course, it will not be so easy. Listen to the people you will meet on the road and most importantly, DO NOT TRUST ANYONE!
summary: The Purge offers you a different experience. Embark on a dark adventure to find your lost Wife Cristina in this story-based game and unravel the mystery behind the deep story. Run from place to place with many universes, enemies and mechanical styles in it and feel the purge.
